attributes.action: (metaphorically) fall on his sword and rid us of this appalling leadership.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The country is in disarray because of the moral vacuum and appalling policies of the current government.  We have a leader who realizes himself that nobody would have elected him as even in the early days he `bottled out' of putting his popularity to the test.  However, even though most of us would not have voted for a party with Gordon Brown as a leader, few could have imagined just how disastrous his leadership would be.  Surely even he can see that it is time to go.  We wish him a long, quiet and invisible retirement.

(This is not covered in other petitions that are currently running, as the above is more general.)

rejection.details:
Your petition must request an action or make a point about government policy. If your petition is not related to the PM resigning then it is unclear what action you are requesting. http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/Resign-Now-Brown 
Please reword and resubmit. Regards, Petitions team.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
